title: The historie of the holy vvarre by Thomas Fuller ...
author: Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.
publisher: Printed by Roger Daniel and are to be sold by John Williams ...,
notes: Added t.p., engraved by William Marshall, preceded by "A declaration of the frontispice" signed: J.C. [i.e. John Cleveland].
Reproduction of original in British Library.
Chronological tables and index: p. [1]-[28] at end.
